publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2417 Brian Adam:Proposal for a Committee Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the proposal for a Committee Bill under Rule 9.15 contained in the 1 st Report 2005 (Session 2) of the Standards Committee, Replacing the Members’ Interests Order (SP Paper 266).
